definition: yaodong (a kind of cave dwelling in the Loess Plateau in northwest China)/CL:孔[kong3]
lit. broken tiles, cold hearth; fig. a broken-down house/poor and shabby dwelling
erhua variant of 窯姐|窑姐[yao2 jie3]
lit. black brick kiln/factories that acquired notoriety in 2007 for slave labor

sentences.english: Speaking of Fortune kiln, not only hemp cities, mountains are famous throughout the eastern Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 说起富鑫窑，不单麻城市，整个鄂东山区都赫赫有名。

sentences.english: What we see here does not add up to traditional Corded Ware cultural norms.
sentences.chinese: 我们在这所看到的并不等于传统的有线窑文化规范。

sentences.english: The furnace employed for making "E" glass is of a type known as a Unit Melter.
sentences.chinese: 用来制造“E”玻璃的窑是一种通称为单元窑的窑炉。

sentences.english: The furnace employed for making "E" glass is of a type known as a Unit Melter.
sentences.chinese: 用来制造“E”玻璃的窑是一种通称为单元窑的窑炉。

sentences.english: Official Opening of the new school at Toa Payoh.
sentences.chinese: 培群在大巴窑校址举行新校舍落成典礼。

sentences.english: Best one should be Jingdezhen kiln, have the glaze and decoration.
sentences.chinese: 以景德镇窑制品最佳，有各色釉和彩绘装饰。

sentences.english: Luckily, hercynite has good property of adhering coating.
sentences.chinese: 而铁铝尖晶石又有很好的挂窑皮能力。

sentences.english: In this paper, the damage mechanism of Zn leaching cinder volatile kiln lining is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文对锌浸出渣挥发窑窑衬破损机理进行了系统研究。

sentences.english: In this paper, the damage mechanism of Zn leaching cinder volatile kiln lining is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文对锌浸出渣挥发窑窑衬破损机理进行了系统研究。

sentences.english: Suitable content of gypsum will be helpful to improve the strength of the soft soil solidified by the cement.
sentences.chinese: 适量的石膏掺入也有利于窑灰水泥固化土强度的提高。

sentences.english: The 2 designs of motor drive for Jingyang kilns are compared in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章就泾阳型窑的两种电力传动方案进行了对比。

sentences.english: In addition, the structural characteristics of the steel frame pre-heater tower were studied.
sentences.chinese: 同时研究了窑尾塔架结构的受力特点。

sentences.english: Much attention has been paid on the suitability and flexibility of the facility in tube distribution.
sentences.chinese: 在管网布局上突出了窑窖滴灌的灵活性与适应性。

sentences.english: Liling is a contemporary kiln in Need.
sentences.chinese: 是当代醴陵窑中的极品。

sentences.english: Bricks are baked in a kiln.
And whoso falleth not down and worshippeth, that he should be cast into the midst of a burning fiery furnace.
sentences.chinese: 凡不俯伏敬拜的，必扔在烈火的窑中。

definition: black eggshell pottery (of the Neolithic Longshan culture)
celadon, classic Chinese style of ceramic glaze
yaodong (a kind of cave dwelling in the Loess Plateau in northwest China)/CL:孔[kong3]
